text: Pedro Páramo is a historical novel from Juan Rulfo. It is Rulfo's first novel, as well as his second work after El Llano en llamas; a collection of stories that touched on the themes of death, rurality and the loss of hope after the Mexican Revolution. It also anticipated his second novel, El gallo de oro, written between 1956 and 1958 but published only in 1980. == References == Category:Mexican novels Category:Historical novels Category:1956 books
